bientity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on either or both the '*_actor_*' and '*_target_*' entities.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on either or both the '*_actor_*' and '*_target_*' entities.

held_item_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the item used by the '*_actor_*' entity for right-clicking the '*_target_*' entity.
held_item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the item used by the '*_actor_*' entity for right-clicking the '*_target_*' entity.

result_item_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the item that is given to the '*_actor_*' entity.
result_item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the item that is given to the '*_actor_*' entity.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both '*_actor_*' and '*_target_*' entities.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both '*_actor_*' and '*_target_*' entities.

item_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by the item used by the '*_actor_*' entity for right-clicking the '*_target_*' entity.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by the item used by the '*_actor_*' entity for right-clicking the '*_target_*' entity.

hands.description: Determines if the power should be activated if the '*_actor_*' entity used the specified hand(s). Accepts `"off_hand"`, `"main_hand"` or both
hands.markdownDescription: Determines if the power should be activated if the '*_actor_*' entity used the specified hand(s). Accepts `"off_hand"`, `"main_hand"` or both

result_stack.description: If specified, this item stack will be given to the '*_actor_*' entity.
result_stack.markdownDescription: If specified, this item stack will be given to the '*_actor_*' entity.

action_result.description: Determines the result of the 'use' action.
action_result.markdownDescription: Determines the result of the 'use' action.

priority.description: Determines the execution priority of the power.
priority.markdownDescription: Determines the execution priority of the power.
